ibis.ipl.impl.nio

Class NioDissipator

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • ibis.io.DataInputStream
        • ibis.ipl.impl.nio.NioDissipator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ibis.io.DataInput, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public abstract class NioDissipator
extends ibis.io.DataInputStream
    Reads data into a single bytebuffer, and creates views of it to drain it. Depends upon a subclass to do the actual reading from somewhere

      • buffer

        protected java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer
        Circular buffer used for holding data. It contains "currently in use" (by the user) data, "not yet used" data (received but not given to user yet) and "empty space"

      • usedPosition

        protected int usedPosition

        public static final int BYTE_BUFFER_SIZE
        Byte buffer size used. Must be a multiple of eight.
